function.name: cookingTimer_getRemainingTime
function.description: This function is used to get the remaining cooking time of a specific appliance compartment.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device whose remaining cooking time is being checked.

predefinedCompartment.description: The specific compartment of the device for which the remaining cooking time is being checked.

groupAction.description: The group action related to the devices.
